Robocode 2018

Robocode is here, 10th of November

Pre-register here

We are happy to announce a new event we are hosting called Robocode. Get ready to program your own personal robot and destroy your competition, in a friendly manner of course.

We will be holding an informational meeting about Robocode on the 5th. This will technically be part of the event, but a fee will not be charged until we meet on the 10th for the actual battling of the robots.

If you want to get a head start you can download the program here
